title: Antenna developer NXT Comm’s assets up for sale
summary: Satellite antenna developer NXT Communications Corp.’s equipment, property, and other collateral are being auctioned off amid production delays that have left L3Harris Technologies in the lurch.

title: NASA leaves its Artemis I rocket exposed to winds above design limits
summary: NASA likely to begin inspections of the rocket and spacecraft later today.

title: NASA to continue Lunar Trailblazer despite cost overrun
summary: NASA will continue a lunar smallsat mission for launch in mid-2023 despite exceeding its cost cap by 30%.

title: Atlas 5 launches weather satellite, reentry tech demo mission
summary: An Atlas 5 successfully launched a polar-orbiting weather satellite and a reentry technology demonstrator on the final flight of the vehicle from California.

title: Atlas rocket bids farewell to California as ULA readies for Vulcan
summary: The Atlas rocket family, a staple of the US launch industry since June 11, 1957, is scheduled to end its West Coast operations on Nov. 10 with the launch of an Atlas V rocket with the JPSS-2 weather satellite.
